page.title: 13Prestwood - Pkt Money & Pets
page.content:
{Average pocket money by age and sex: Average Avge Avge Age (Boys & Girls) Boys Girls 8.00-8.11 0.50 0.48 0.52 9.00-9.11 0.69 0.66 0.70 10.00-10.11 0.86 0.98 0.70 11.00-12+ 1.19 1.38 0.96}
Average pocket money of those who answered the question is 89p. Each week those who answered the question receive 155.50 pounds in the form of pocket money. In 52 weeks the pocket money received amounts to 8086 pounds. _______________________________________ {Out of the 180 children who responded:- 33 Children have no pets, 13 of these are girls, 20 boys. 5 children have 15 or more pets. 10 children have 10-14 pets. 15 children have 5-9 pets. }
